alert.note: Alert for West Polk (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 23 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Polk County through 645 PM CDT... At 600 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Crookston, or 17 miles east of Grand Forks, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Key West around 615 PM CDT. Euclid around 620 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Sherack, Angus and Tabor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for northwestern Minnesota.
